alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gilchrist, west central Alachua and south central Columbia Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 158 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bell, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Bell, High Springs and Fort White. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
